DOC.brief_summary: This study represent first administration GSK625433 human . The study design evaluate initial safety tolerability healthy adult well anti-viral activity Hepatitis C ( HVC ) infect adult . The way human body process GSK625433 also investigate .
DOC.brief_title: Monotherapy Versus Placebo Over 14 17 Days Healthy Hepatitis C Infected Adults
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy male & female Part 1 age 1860 Part 2 age 1850 & 6580 Within normal weight range give height Negative urine drug alcohol test Willing follow study procedure Exclusion criterion : Any significant abnormal lab , ECG , medical physical exam find screen Allergy study drug Excessive alcohol intake Positive HIV hepatitis B C result Use prescription nonprescription drug within one week study start except birth control Blood pressure med & Tylenol Pregnant lactate woman
